mapper.update:
update toa_machine_inout set
EQUIPMENT_NUMBER=#{equipmentNumber},
COMPANY_ID=#{companyId},
COMPANY_NAME=#{companyName},
MACHINA=#{machina},
CONTACT=#{contact},
TEL=#{tel},
INT_DATE=#{intDate},
TYPE=#{type},
COUNTT=#{countt},
DEVICE_INFO=#{deviceInfo},
INT_PEOPLE=#{intPeople},
IS_INPUT=#{isInput},
CAOZGCS=#{caozgcs},
ORIGIN=#{origin},
REMARK=#{remark},
STATUS=#{status},
DELETE_FLAG=#{deleteFlag},
CREATE_USER=#{createUser},
CREATE_USER_DEPT=#{createUserDept},
CREATE_DATE=#{createDate},
MODIFY_USER=#{modifyUser},
MODIFY_DATE=#{modifyDate},
EXT_STR1=#{extStr1},
EXT_STR2=#{extStr2},
EXT_STR3=#{extStr3},
EXT_STR4=#{extStr4},
EXT_STR5=#{extStr5},
EXT_DATE1=#{extDate1},
EXT_DATE2=#{extDate2},
EXT_NUM1=#{extNum1},
EXT_NUM2=#{extNum2},
EXT_NUM3=#{extNum3},
MODIFY_DATE = #{modifyDateNew} where ID = #{id} and MODIFY_DATE = #{modifyDate}
